attributes.action: Have a debate to sort the countries appalling Litter and Fly Tipping problems!
attributes.additional_details:
Bring in stronger laws to combat the issues, make public awareness via media that this problem is NOT  going to be tolerated !  
Make it easier for courts to issue public service / payback orders to make litter louts / fly tipping .
Make the schools educate children in how to dispose of litter properly.
Make the likes of KFC, Burger King , Mcdonalds etc etc more responsible to recycle and clean up the areas they trade in.
attributes.background:
Make councils and authorities more responsible for collecting and recycling.
Make it easier for Police and Courts to Fine and prosecute offenders , if they can not pay fines then community orders to make them clean areas locally.  
The Roadsides and Laybys are National Disgrace !

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Start a government "do not drop litter" campaign
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717322

Provide funding to address roadside litter across motorways and towns
